text:
We're turning the #coronavirus tide!

Downstate's #frontline staff are receiving the first round of #COVID19 #vaccinations.

Our #HealthcareHeroes have been by #Brooklyn's side since the start of the #pandemic... and with the #vaccine, they always will be.

#DownstateSTRONG 💙 https://t.co/4TSMtqXlEe
